ray_of_frost.name: Ray of Frost
ray_of_frost.description: A ray of freezing air and ice shoots toward your target. Ranged spell attack.

acid_splash.name: Acid Splash
acid_splash.description: You hurl a bubble of acid at your target. Ranged spell attack.

daze.name: Daze
daze.description: Daze a creature with 5 HP or less. Will save negates. Stunned for 1 turn.

divine_favor.name: Divine Favor
divine_favor.description: Divine power guides your next attack or saving throw (+1).

resistance.name: Resistance
resistance.description: You gain divine protection on your next saving throw (+1).

sacred_flame.name: Sacred Flame
sacred_flame.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature. Will save negates.

paralyzing_touch.name: Paralyzing Touch
paralyzing_touch.description: A touch of necrotic energy paralyzes your foe. Melee spell attack for 1d3 necrotic damage, Fortitude save or be Stunned for 1 turn.

thunderwave.name: Thunderwave
thunderwave.description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Fortitude save for half damage.
